did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Carme Pinos booklet, Ms2001-040, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The Carme Pinos collection was added to the IAWA Small Collections Ms2009-054 in September 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Carme Pinos was born in Barcelona in 1954, and graduated from the Barcelona School of Architecture in 1979. Some of Pinos' projects include the Llauna Factory-School, the Igualada Cemetery, the Hostalets de Balanya Civic Center, and the Olympic Archery Range-all completed with partner Enric Miralles. In 1994 Pinos was awarded the Plym Distinguished Professor in Architecture by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, and taught at the University from 1994-1995.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Carme Pinos Architectural papers consist of a booklet, published in 1995 to showcase Pinos' work when she was awarded the Plym Distinguished Professorship in Architecture at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign in 1994. The booklet contains pictures of Pinos' work and comments from students and colleagues.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: See also the IAWA Small Collections, Ms2009-054. Finding aid available on the Virginia Heritage database.
